channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: European banks plan to cut 200,000 jobs as AI takes hold
item.description: The bloodletting will hit hardest in back-office operations, risk management, and compliance.

item.title: There Is So Much New Lego You Can Buy in January
item.description: The new year is always a wild time for Lego releases, and 2026 is certainly no exception.

item.title: How to watch Hyundai's CES 2026 presentation live
item.description: A look at Hyundai's Holographic Windshield Display. (Hyundai) While it often feels like a full-on auto show, the car vibes feel somewhat lessened at CES 2026. Yes, the Afeela electric vehicle from the Sony-Honda joint venture will be back on the floor, but with the Trump administration yanking most EV incentives from the market, the industry isn't offering a full-court press of new vehicles in Las Vegas this year. That said, there's still plenty of in-cabin car tech on display, including Hyundai's Holographic Windshield Display. Indeed, the company's Mobis subsidiary will present "more than 3...

item.title: Voici les smartphones les plus attendus de 2026
item.description: Bonne année et meilleurs vœux ! On commence direct avec notre liste des smartphones les plus attendus de 2026 (et quelques tendances) !

item.title: Un observatoire sans équivalent pour percer les secrets des événements les plus violents de l’Univers
item.description: Courant décembre, une étape marquante pour l'astronomie a été franchie avec le début des travaux de construction du réseau sud du Cherenkov Telescope Array Observatory (CTAO) dans le désert d'Atacama, au Chili. Ce projet international promet d'être le plus grand et le plus puissant observatoire...

item.title: TechRadar's Year in Review 2025 – the biggest trends in AI, phones, computing, TVs, gaming and more
item.description: It's been quite the year for tech! Here's our round up of the biggest trends in phones, computing, TVs, gaming, cameras, streaming and more in 2025.

item.title: OpenAI bets big on audio as Silicon Valley declares war on screens
item.description: The form factors may differ, but the thesis is the same: audio is the interface of the future. Every space -- your home, your car, even your face -- is becoming an interface.
